channel.title: Project-rs
channel.description:
[SIZE="7"][COLOR="Red"]Project-rs[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[COLOR="Blue"][SIZE="5"]the build of the pk Revolution has started[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[SIZE="3"][COLOR="DeepSkyBlue"]Based on winterlove due no lag! and a empty source without messed code[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[COLOR="Red"]lines atm: 13793[/COLOR]
[COLOR="Red"][SIZE="4"]Future Updates[/SIZE][/COLOR] Full woodcutting Full prayer More timers for weapons Full ranging with gfx Magic on players Speeding up xp rate fixing animation/hit [for making animation when it hits :) ] Adding firemaking Adding special attack
[COLOR="Red"][SIZE="4"]Updated[/SIZE][/COLOR] Added nearly full magic on npc's! Added drops from txt Added full mining Added full player face player/player face npc/npc face player Added a bit of farming/herblore Added membership for donators Added range on npc with projectiles Added fix for stackable(no multi runes anymore or money like in picture 1)
[COLOR="Red"][SIZE="4"]Updated on client[/SIZE][/COLOR] Full prayer icons Lava cape got animations Changing item name with .dat file
pictures ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img503.imageshack.us/img503/7006/39725646dx3.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img503.imageshack.us/img503/415/43674114tr5.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: Project-rs

item.description:
@laurens800 wrote:

[SIZE=“7”][COLOR=“Red”]Project-rs[/COLOR][/SIZE]

[COLOR=“Blue”][SIZE=“5”]the build of the pk Revolution has started[/SIZE][/COLOR]

[SIZE=“3”][COLOR=“DeepSkyBlue”]Based on winterlove due no lag! and a empty source without messed code[/COLOR][/SIZE]

[COLOR=“Red”]lines atm: 13793[/COLOR]

[COLOR=“Red”][SIZE=“4”]Future Updates[/SIZE][/COLOR]
Full woodcutting
Full prayer
More timers for weapons
Full ranging with gfx
Magic on players
Speeding up xp rate
fixing animation/hit [for making animation when it hits ]
Adding firemaking
Adding special attack

[COLOR=“Red”][SIZE=“4”]Updated[/SIZE][/COLOR]
Added nearly full magic on npc’s!
Added drops from txt
Added full mining
Added full player face player/player face npc/npc face player
Added a bit of farming/herblore
Added membership for donators
Added range on npc with projectiles
Added fix for stackable(no multi runes anymore or money like in picture 1)

[COLOR=“Red”][SIZE=“4”]Updated on client[/SIZE][/COLOR]
Full prayer icons
Lava cape got animations
Changing item name with .dat file
